item.dc:creator: @TheNewEmphatic
item.description:
One year ago The New Emphatic first appeared in physical form on a Bolivian Fireships remix album on @hrea_m
In the year that past since, these are the artefacts where The New Emphatic can be found on.

Thank you!
@hrea_m
@WormholeWorld
@_abeautifulidea
@darkoutside
@bibliotapes1

item.title: Bibliotapes is on hold again as the cases ran out because someone bought all of them ( me ) and am waiting for more to be made. The prototype non-plastic one couldn't be guaranteed to arrive without being mangled/bent/ruined in the post so best to wait for the sturdier ones
item.dc:creator: @bibliotapes1
item.description:
Bibliotapes is on hold again as the cases ran out because someone bought all of them ( me ) and am waiting for more to be made.
The prototype non-plastic one couldn't be guaranteed to arrive without being mangled/bent/ruined in the post so best to wait for the sturdier ones
